00072           public function __construct(){
00073                     if(file_exists($this->path.$this->_cachefile)){
00074                     
00075                               $vars=file_get_contents($this->path.$this->_cachefile);
00076                               $vars=unserialize($vars);
00077                               
00078                               if(is_array($vars)){
00079                                         $this->cacheconfig=$vars;
00080                               }
00081                     }
00082                     $this->_timestamp=time().'000';
00083                     $this->path=dirname(__FILE__).'/';
00084           }

00093           private function setcachvalue(){
00094                     
00095                     if($this->admin_username!=''){
00096                               $a=&$this->cacheconfig['admin'][$this->admin_username];
00097                               $a=array(
00098                                         'authtoken'=>$this->admin_authtoken,
00099                                         'sessid'=>$this->admin_sessid,
00100                                         'endtime'=>$this->admin_endtime
00101                               );
00102                               //echo "dateY: ".date('d.m.Y H:i',$a['endtime']);
00103                     }
00104                     
00105                     if($this->user_username!=''){
00106                               $a=&$this->cacheconfig['user'][$this->user_username];
00107                               $a=array(
00108                                         'authtoken'=>$this->user_authtoken,
00109                                         'sessid'=>$this->user_sessid,
00110                                         'endtime'=>$this->user_endtime
00111                               );
00112                     }
00113                     
00114                     $vars=serialize($this->cacheconfig);
00115                     
00116                     file_put_contents($this->path.$this->_cachefile,$vars);
00117           }

00128           public function soaperr($text,$client, $exception=''){
00129                     
00130                     
00131                     ob_start();
00132                     echo "<pre>\n\n=============== SOAP ERROR ANFANG =======================\n";
00133                     echo "$text \n";
00134                     
00135                     echo "\n\nRESPONSE:m\n";
00136                     print_r($this->client->__getLastRequest());
00137                     print_r( $this->xml2array($this->client->__getLastRequest()));
00138                     
00139                     echo "\n\nRESPONSEm:\n";
00140                     print_r($this->client->__getLastResponse());
00141                     print_r( $this->xml2array($this->client->__getLastResponse()));
00142                     echo "\n====================SOAP ERROR ENDE ==================\n\n<pre>";
00143                     
00144                     $out=ob_get_clean();
00145                     $out=$out."\n=======================".date('d.m.Y H:i')."==============\n";
00146                     
00147                     zlog::errlog($out);
00148 
00149           }

00161           private function admin_login($forcenew=false){
00162                     // wenn nicht erzwungen und Wenn AUTH und SESSID gespeichert und die jetzt jünger als endzeit ist... 
00163                     // => diese nehmen => return
00164                     if(!$forcenew && isset($this->cacheconfig['admin'][$this->admin_username])){
00165                               
00166                               $data=$this->cacheconfig['admin'][$this->admin_username];
00167                               if(     isset($data['sessid']) && isset($data['authtoken']) && isset($data['endtime']) 
00168                                   && mktime()<$data['endtime']
00169                               ){
00170                                         $this->admin_sessid=$data['sessid'];
00171                                         $this->admin_authtoken=$data['authtoken'];
00172                                         return;
00173                               }
00174                     // Ansonsten einloggen
00175                     }
00176                     
00177                     $header=new SoapHeader('urn:zimbra','context');
00178                               
00179                     $params=array(
00180                               new SoapParam($this->admin_username,'name'),
00181                               new SoapParam($this->admin_password,'password')
00182                     );
00183 
00184                     $options=array('uri'=>'urn:zimbraAdmin');
00185                     
00186                     $result=$this->dosoap('AuthRequest',$header,$params,$options,true);
00187                     
00188                     $this->admin_sessid=$result['sessionId'];
00189                     $this->admin_authtoken=$result['authToken'];
00190                     $this->admin_endtime=mktime()+$result['lifetime']/1000; // Kommt in ms an interessanter weise...?
00191                     $this->setcachvalue();
00192           }
00193           
00203           private function dosoap_admin($action,$soap,$forcenewlogin=false){
00204                     
00205                     $this->admin_login($forcenewlogin);
00206                     
00207                     $soap_header='
00208 <context xmlns="urn:zimbra">
00209 <authToken>'.$this->admin_authtoken.'</authToken>
00210 <sessionId id="'.$this->admin_sessid.'">'.$this->admin_sessid.'</sessionId> 
00211 </context>';
00212                     $header=new SoapHeader(
00213                               'urn:zimbra',
00214                               'context',
00215                               new SoapVar($soap_header,XSD_ANYXML)
00216                     );
00217                     
00218                     $params=array(
00219                               new SoapVar($soap,XSD_ANYXML)
00220                     );
00221                     
00222                     
00223                     $options=array('uri'=>'urn:zimbraAdmin');
00224                     
00225                     $response=$this->dosoap($action,$header,$params,$options);
00226                     $response_a=$this->xml2array($response);
00227                                                             
00228                     
00229                     // Bei Fehlern...                  
00230                     if(isset($response_a['soap:Body']['soap:Fault']['soap:detail']['Error']['Code'])){
00231                               
00232                               $err=$response_a['soap:Body']['soap:Fault']['soap:detail']['Error']['Code'];
00233                               
00234                               // Wenn AUTH fehlgeschlagen, aufhören...
00235                               if($err=='account.AUTH_FAILED'){
00236                                         echo "AUTH FAILED";
00237                                         return false;
00238                               
00239                               // Wenn Fehler und newlogin nicht getan, sondern auf vergangene Session vertraut => nochmal probieren
00240                               // mit erzwungenem einloggen
00241                               }else if($err=='service.AUTH_REQUIRED'){
00242                                         if(!$forcenewlogin){
00243                                                   return $this->dosoap_admin($action,$soap,true);                                 
00244                                         }else{
00245                                                   echo "AUTH FAILED (ENDLESS)";
00246                                                   return false;
00247                                         }
00248                               }
00249                     }
00250                               
00251                     
00252                     return $this->xml2array($response);
00253           }

00263           private function user_login($forcenew=false){
00264                     
00265                     // wenn nicht erzwungen und Wenn AUTH und SESSID gespeichert und die jetzt jünger als endzeit ist... 
00266                     // => diese nehmen => return
00267                     if(!$forcenew && isset($this->cacheconfig['user'][$this->user_username])){
00268                     
00269                               $data=$this->cacheconfig['user'][$this->user_username];
00270                               
00271                               if(    isset($data['sessid']) && isset($data['authtoken']) && isset($data['endtime']) 
00272                                   && mktime()<$data['endtime']
00273                                 ){
00274                                         $this->user_sessid=$data['sessid'];
00275                                         $this->user_authtoken=$data['authtoken'];
00276                                         return;
00277                               }
00278                     // Ansonsten einloggen
00279                     }
00280                     
00281                     $by_value='name';
00282           
00283                     $preauth_uncrypt=$this->user_username.'|'.$by_value.'|'.$this->_preauth_expiration.'|'.$this->_timestamp; 
00284                     $preauth_crypt=hash_hmac('sha1',$preauth_uncrypt,$this->_preAuthKey);
00285                                         
00286                     $soap='
00287 <account by="name">'.$this->user_username.'</account> 
00288 <preauth timestamp="'.$this->_timestamp.'" expires="'.$this->_preauth_expiration.'">'.$preauth_crypt.'</preauth>
00289 ';
00290                     
00291                     $header=new SoapHeader('urn:zimbra','context');
00292                     $params=array(new SoapVar($soap,XSD_ANYXML));
00293                     
00294                     $options=array('uri'=>'urn:zimbraAccount');
00295                     
00296                     $result=$this->dosoap('AuthRequest',$header,$params,$options,true);
00297                     
00298                     $this->user_sessid=$result['sessionId'];
00299                     $this->user_authtoken=$result['authToken'];
00300                     $this->user_endtime=mktime()+$result['lifetime']/1000; // Kommt in ms an interessanter weise...?
00301                               
00302                     $this->setcachvalue();
00303           }

00378           private function dosoap($action,$header,$params,$options,$loginaction=false){
00379                               
00380                     try{
00381                               $result = $this->client->__soapCall(
00382                                         $action, 
00383                                         $params, 
00384                                         $options,
00385                                         $header
00386                               );
00387 
00388                     }catch (SoapFault $exception) {
00389                     }
00390                     
00391                     if(zimbraConfig::debug){
00392                               echo "<pre>\n\n=============== SOAP ANFANG =======================\n";
00393                               
00394                               echo "\n\nREQUEST:m\n";
00395                               print_r($this->client->__getLastRequest());
00396                               print_r( $this->xml2array($this->client->__getLastRequest()));
00397                               
00398                               echo "\n\nRESPONSEm:\n";
00399                               print_r($this->client->__getLastResponse());
00400                               print_r( $this->xml2array($this->client->__getLastResponse()));
00401                               echo "\n====================SOAP ENDE ==================\n\n<pre>";
00402                     }
00403                     
00404                     // Bei Login kommt hier der authtoken, sessid usw. zurück.
00405                     if($loginaction){
00406                               if(isset($result)){
00407                                         return $result;
00408                               }else{
00409                                         return false;
00410                               }
00411                     }else{
00412                               return $this->client->__getLastResponse();
00413                     }
00414           }

00422           function builduserclient(){
00423                     if($this->client_user==null){
00424                               $this->client_user=new SoapClient(null,
00425                                         array(
00426                                                   'location' => $this->_userlocation,
00427                                                   'uri' => "urn:zimbra",
00428                                                   'trace' => 1,
00429                                                   'exceptions' => 1,
00430                                                   'soap_version' => SOAP_1_1,
00431                                                   'style' => SOAP_RPC,
00432                                                   'use' => SOAP_LITERAL
00433                                         )
00434                               );
00435                     }
00436                     $this->client=&$this->client_user;
00437           }

00450           public function douser($username,$action,$urn,$soap,$options=array()){
00451                     
00452                     $this->user_username=$username;
00453                     $this->builduserclient();
00454                     
00455                     if(count($options)>0){
00456                               $this->options=$options;
00457                     }else{
00458                               $this->options=$this->defaultopions;
00459                     }
00460                     
00461                     $a=$this->dosoap_user($action,$urn,$soap);
00462                     
00463                     return $a;
00464                     
00465           }

00500           public function doadmin($username,$password,$action,$soap,$options=false){
00501                     $this->buildadminclient();
00502                     
00503                     if(count($options)>0){
00504                               $this->options=$options;
00505                     }else{
00506                               $this->options=$this->defaultopions;
00507                     }
00508                     
00509                     $this->admin_username=$username;
00510                     $this->admin_password=$password;
00511                     
00512                     $a=$this->dosoap_admin($action,$soap);
00513                     
00514                     return $a;

00527           // donnotaskey: Ausschalten: bei <a n="zimbramailirgendwas">Value</a> => array[zimbramailirgendwas]=Value
00535           function xml2array($contents){
00536                     
00537                     if(isset($this->options['parse']) && $this->options['parse']===false){
00538                               return $contents;
00539                     }
00540                     
00541                     // XML Parser herrichten...
00542                     ini_set('include_path', $this->path.'PEAR');
00543                     set_include_path($this->path.'PEAR');
00544                     
00545                     require_once 'XML/Unserializer.php';
00546                     $options=array(
00547                               XML_UNSERIALIZER_OPTION_ATTRIBUTES_PARSE    => true,
00548                               //XML_UNSERIALIZER_OPTION_ATTRIBUTES_ARRAYKEY => false
00549                     );
00550                     
00551                     //user options...
00552                     if(!isset($this->options['donnotaskey']) || $this->options['donnotaskey']!=1){
00553                               $options['keyAttribute']='n'; 
00554                     }
00555                     
00556                     //  be careful to always use the ampersand in front of the new operator                                       
00557                     $unserializer = new XML_Unserializer(
00558                               $options
00559                     );
00560                     
00561                     
00562                     $status = $unserializer->unserialize($contents, false);   
00563 
00564                     if(PEAR::isError($status)){
00565                               echo 'Error: ' . $status->getMessage();
00566                     }else{
00567                               $d = $unserializer->getUnserializedData();
00568                               return $d;
00569                     }
00570           }

00587           public function doUpload($username, $files){
00588                     // Authentifizieren...
00589                     // einmal nur als user...
00590                     // Wegen autthoken...
00591                     
00592                     //echo "Test".$this->user_authtoken."test";
00593                     $retval=false;
00594                     
00595                     // Files uploaden...
00596                     if(!is_array($files)){
00597                               $files=array($files);
00598                     }
00599                     
00600                     // Post array vorbereiten...
00601                     $post=array();
00602                     
00603                     $i=0;     
00604                     foreach($files as $filetoupload){
00605                               $filepath=$this->getUploadFile($filetoupload);
00606                               if($filepath!==false){
00607                                         $post['file'.$i]='@'.$filepath;
00608                                         $i++;
00609                               }
00610                     }
00611                     
00612                     // Wenn noch nicht eingellogged => einloggen
00613                     if(strlen($this->user_authtoken)<3){
00614                               $this->user_username=$username;
00615                               $this->builduserclient();
00616                               $this->user_login(true); // with forcenew...
00617                     }
00618                     
00619                     $post['requestId']='client_token'; // Hier kann man irgendwas einfügen...
00620 
00621                     // Wenn Files zum uploaden da...
00622                     if($i>0){
00623                               
00624                               $this->builduserclient();
00625                               $this->user_username=$username;
00626                               $this->user_login();
00627                               
00628                               $ch = curl_init();
00629                               curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HEADER, 0);
00630                               curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_VERBOSE, 0);
00631                               curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
00632                               curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_USERAGENT, 'Mozilla/4.0 (compatible;)');
00633                               curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $this->_uploadlocation.'?fmt=raw' );
00634                               curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, true);
00635                               curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_COOKIE,'ZM_AUTH_TOKEN='.$this->user_authtoken);
00636                               
00637                               // Vorfühlen
00638                               $response = curl_exec($ch);
00639                               if(strpos($response,'HTTP ERROR: 401')!==false){
00640                                         echo "AUTH FAILED1";
00641                                         // Neu Login erzwingen...
00642                                         $this->user_login(true);
00643                                         curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_COOKIE,'ZM_AUTH_TOKEN='.$this->user_authtoken);
00644                                         $response = curl_exec($ch);
00645                               }
00646                               
00647                               // Wenn leerer Upload geklappt hat
00648                               if(strpos($response,"204,'null'")!==false){
00649                                         curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $post); 
00650                                         $response = curl_exec($ch);
00651                                         
00652                                         $response=preg_match('/200,\'client_token\',\'(.*)\'/msU',$response,$out);
00653                                         $retval=explode(',',$out[1]);
00654                               
00655                               // Wenn nicht...
00656                               }else{
00657                                         echo "Fehler: AUTH";
00658                                         p($response);
00659                               }
00660                               
00661                               //p($out);
00662                               $this->cleantmp_filedir();
00663 
00664                     }else{
00665                               echo "No files to Upload";
00666                     }
00667                     
00668                     return $retval;
00669           }

00672           // [i][0]=ordner
00673           // [i][1]=file (Ohne path!)
00677           var $tmp_filedir=array();
00678 
00686           private function getUploadFile($filetoupload){
00687                     
00688                     $urlext=array('http');
00689                     
00690                     $pathtofile=$filetoupload;
00691                     
00692                     foreach($urlext as $prot){
00693                               if(strpos($filetoupload,$prot.'://')!==false){
00694                                         
00695                                         // Ordner, damit der Filename erhalten bleibt!
00696                                         $pathtofile_dir=$this->path.'/'.$this->_tmpdir.'/'.mktime().'_'.rand();
00697                                         
00698                                         mkdir($pathtofile_dir,0777);
00699                                         
00700                                         // Filenamen holen..
00701                                         $fileinfo=pathinfo($filetoupload);
00702           
00703                                         $pathtofile=$pathtofile_dir.'/'.$fileinfo['basename'];
00704                                         
00705                                         // Datei von Internet temporär speichern, wenn vorhanden
00706                                         $fp=@fopen($filetoupload,'r');
00707                                         if($fp!==false){
00708                                                   $bits=file_get_contents($filetoupload);
00709                                                   file_put_contents($pathtofile,$bits);
00710                                                   
00711                                                   // zum löschen markieren im array
00712                                                   $this->tmp_filedir[]=array($pathtofile_dir,$fileinfo['basename']);
00713                                         
00714                                         }
00715                                         if($fp!==false)fclose($fp);
00716           
00717                                         break;
00718                               }
00719                     }
00720                     
00721                     // Wenn datei nicht lokal exisitiert...
00722                     if(!file_exists($pathtofile)){
00723                               echo "File not found: $filetoupload<br>\n";
00724                               return false;
00725                     }
00726                     
00727                     return $pathtofile;
00728           }
00729           
00736           private function cleantmp_filedir(){
00737                     if(isset($this->tmp_filedir)){
00738                               foreach($this->tmp_filedir as $d){
00739                                         unlink($d[0].'/'.$d[1]);
00740                                         rmdir($d[0]);
00741                               }
00742                     }
00743           }
